page.description: Generate a SQL Drop Database statement for the table passed in.
page.syntax: SQL_Statement as C = GenerateDropDatabaseStatement as C (Database as C)

argument.name: SQL_Statement
argument.description: An add user group statement appropriate for the database.

argument.name: Database
argument.description: The name of the database to drop.

page.discussion: The .GenerateDropDatabaseStatement() method generates the SQL statement that will remove a database. Note: Not all database vendors support dropping a database through SQL.

section.description: Note, Microsoft Access does not support dropping a database.
